summary:
In the first era Ayleids ruled Cyrodiil. After the rebellion of the holy Alessia suddenly disappeared.
Not seen them in two eras. Now in the fourth era dragonborn is one of them will Ayleid returned?
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This mod add a playable Ayleid race and Ayleid Vampire race to Skyrim.They have unique ablities and powers.
[/size]
[size=3]Fragment from UESPWiki
"The[color=#b45f06] [b]Ayleids[/b][/color], also known as the [b]Wild Elves[/b] or [b]Heartland High Elves[/b], were the first race to establish an empire in Tamriel, and had ruled modern-day Cyrodiil for countless years dating back to before recorded history'' "The Ayleids were the original founders of the Imperial City, which they called the "Temple of the Ancestors". However, their empire collapsed in the early First Era. While it's believed that the Ayleids remain in the wilds of every province on Tamriel, sightings have been few. There have been no known sightings in the Third or Fourth Eras." "They also developed what came to be called the school of Alteration, as they were skilled in magics such as shapeshifting and levitation. As for their appearance, like all elves, they were most likely thin and lean with pointed ears and angular facial features. Their complexion was lighter than that of the[color=#999999] Dunmer[/color], but they were darker than[color=#ffe599] Altmer[/color].They preserved many of the ancient runes and Dawn Era magics of the Ehlnofey that other elves had forgotten."

More Informations:[url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Ayleids]http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Ayleids[/url][/size]
[color=#00ff00]
[b][size=4]Plese Endorse if you like.[/size][/b][/color]


[size=4]Ayleid abilities:
Magicka Resistance 50%
Congenital Magic:+200 magicka points
The creators of the Alternation School-alternation spells last 150% longer.

Installation
Place Ayleid Playable Race.esp in data folder in your skyrim directory[/size]
[size=3][u][color=#00ff00][font=Arial]This is my first mod, so will the new improved versions.[/font][/color][/u]

[/size][color=#ff0000][size=3]Sorry for the slight modification of the ability of high-born in the high elves[/size][/color]

[color=#00ffff][size=4]If you have a problem with skin color in Ayleid move  to the last character presets.[/size][/color]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Please if someone can let the video do the mod.[/size][/color]


[color=#1c4587][size=3]Soon mod will be fully in English[/size][/color]

This mod should be compatible whit all mods.


[size=4][color=#f4f4f4]
-Changelog 
Version 1.00
